properties.description: Low.
properties.name: LOW

properties.description: Allows the use of optional discretionary ligatures.
properties.name: DISCRETIONARY_LIGATURES_FEATURE

properties.description: Reformats numbers separated by a slash, such as 1/2, as fractions. Note: In some fonts, the fractions feature reformats only standard fractions. For information on reformatting non-standard fractions such as 4/13, see denominator feature and numerator feature.
properties.name: FRACTIONS_FEATURE

properties.description: Superscripts the alpha characters in ordinal numbers.
properties.name: ORDINAL_FEATURE

properties.description: Provides regular and contextual swashes, which may include alternate caps and end-of-word alternatives.
properties.name: SWASH_FEATURE

properties.description: Activates alternative characters used for uppercase titles.
properties.name: TITLING_FEATURE

properties.description: Activates contextual ligatures and connecting alternates.
properties.name: CONTEXTUAL_ALTERNATES_FEATURE

properties.description: Provides authentic small caps rather than scaled-down versions of the font's regular caps.
properties.name: ALL_SMALL_CAPS_FEATURE

properties.description: Sizes raised glyphs correctly relative to the surrounding characters.
properties.name: SUPERSCRIPT_FEATURE

properties.description: Sizes lowered glyphs correctly relative to the surrounding characters.
properties.name: SUBSCRIPT_FEATURE

properties.description: In a series of two numbers separated by a slash that form a non-standard fraction, such as 4/13, reformats the first number as a numerator.
properties.name: NUMERATOR_FEATURE

properties.description: In a series of two numbers separated by a slash that form a non-standard fraction, such as 4/13, reformats the second number as a denominator.
properties.name: DENOMINATOR_FEATURE

properties.description: Gives full-height figures fixed, equal width.
properties.name: TABULAR_LINING_FEATURE

properties.description: Gives varying-height figures varying widths.
properties.name: PROPORTIONAL_OLDSTYLE_FEATURE

properties.description: Gives full-height figures varying widths.
properties.name: PROPORTIONAL_LINING_FEATURE

properties.description: Gives varying-height figures fixed, equal widths.
properties.name: TABULAR_OLDSTYLE_FEATURE

properties.description: Applies the default figure style of the current font to figure glyphs.
properties.name: DEFAULT_FIGURE_STYLE_FEATURE

properties.description: Overlap swash
properties.name: OVERLAP_SWASH

properties.description: Stylistic alternate
properties.name: STYLISTIC_ALTERNATE

properties.description: Justification alternate
properties.name: JUSTIFICATION_ALTERNATE

properties.description: Stretched alternate
properties.name: STRETCHED_ALTERNATE
